resources.string: I study at University of Tashkent information technologies in Uzbekistan at the faculty of computer engineering. 1 year experience. I am interested in Web technology and IOS programming And im going to study this technologies in near future: Android skills Retrofit, Butterknife, OkHttp, Picasso, Glide, RxJava, RxAndroid Java, Kotlin knowledge Fragments and activities interaction, Intents, content providers Support library (CardView, RecyclerView, etc)
